meanings.definition: The pair of bones that connect the shoulder blades to the sternum.
meanings.sent1: Her collarbones were delicate and easily visible under her skin.
meanings.sent2: He felt a sharp pain in his collarbones after lifting heavy boxes all day.
meanings.sent3: The collarbones of the skeleton seemed to be whispering secrets to each other.
meanings.sent4: The dancer's collarbones were like delicate bridges connecting her upper body.
meanings.sent5: The collarbones stood out prominently on the X-ray, showing no signs of injury.

meanings.definition: The bones that form the front part of the shoulder girdle.
meanings.sent1: She felt a twinge in her collarbones as she stretched her arms overhead.
meanings.sent2: The doctor pointed out the collarbones on the anatomy chart during the lesson.
meanings.sent3: The collarbones of the car seemed to be holding the engine in place.
meanings.sent4: His collarbones felt like sturdy pillars supporting his upper body.
meanings.sent5: The collarbones were like two gentle slopes leading to the chest cavity.
